summary: Completed frontend testing of 3D Glass Configurator with click-to-place shapes, resize handles, and rotation. All 13 features tested and working correctly.

features_tested.2. Shape selection buttons visible: PASS - All 5 shape buttons visible: Hole, Rectangle, Triangle, Hexagon, Heart with data-testid attributes

features_tested.4. Clicking on 3D glass preview places s: PASS - Shape placed at click position with default size (Hole: Ø50mm, Rectangle: 100×80mm)
features_tested.5. Placed shape shows inner dimension la: PASS - Labels show 'H Ø 50 mm' for Hole, 'R 100 × 80 mm' for Rectangle
features_tested.6. Edge distance labels show and update: PASS - Red distance labels show ← mm, → mm, ↑ mm, ↓ mm from all 4 edges
features_tested.7. Selected shape shows 8 blue resize ha: PASS - 8 blue spheres visible around selected shape (4 corners + 4 midpoints)
features_tested.8. Selected shape shows green rotation h: PASS - Green sphere visible above shape with connecting line
features_tested.9. Shape can be dragged to move: PASS - Drag operation moves shape, distances update in real-time
features_tested.10. Zoom In/Out/Reset buttons work: PASS - All 3 zoom control buttons functional
features_tested.11. Multiple shapes can be added: PASS - Successfully added Hole, Rectangle, Triangle, Hexagon, Heart shapes
features_tested.12. Cutout list updates with each new sh: PASS - List shows 'Cutouts (n):' with shape names and dimensions
features_tested.13. Price updates when shapes are added: PASS - Price updates from ₹0 to ₹787.74 (1 cutout) to ₹905.74 (2 cutouts) to ₹1,023.74 (3 cutouts)
